committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Public Lands and National Parks

official_title: A bill to amend the Act of November 5, 1966, providing for the establishment of the Indiana Dunes National Lakeshore to authorize the appropriation of an additional $576,000 for development of the Paul H. Douglas Environmental Education Center.

summary.text: Increases from $500,000 to $1,076,000 the amount which may be appropriated for the development of the Paul H. Douglas Environmental Education Center within the Indiana Dunes National Lakeshore in Indiana.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Act of November 5, 1966, providing for the establishment of the Indiana Dunes National Lakeshore to authorize the appropriation of an additional $576,000 for development of the Paul H. Douglas Environmental Education Center.
